user.name=Dr Nic Williams
user.email=drnicwilliams@gmail.com
alias.co=checkout
alias.push-all=!for i in $(git config --list | grep -E ^remote\..+\.url | sed -E 's/^remote\.(.*)\.url=.*/\1/'); do git push $i master; done
apply.whitespace=nowarn
color.status=auto
color.branch=auto
merge.tool=opendiff
core.excludesfile=/Users/nicwilliams/.gitignore
core.repositoryformatversion=0
core.filemode=true
core.bare=false
core.logallrefupdates=true
remote.origin.url=git@github.com:tablatom/rubydoctest.git
remote.origin.fetch=refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
remote.rubyforge.url=gitosis@rubyforge.org:rubydoctest.git
remote.rubyforge.fetch=refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/rubyforge/*
